name: MineBreaker
description:
Created for the 2019 Minecraft Game Jam!

Select the best tool for the job and aim for the highscore!

1 - Select Sword

2 - Select Pickaxe

3 - Select Axe

4 - Select Shovel

Observation: Art from mojang's minecraft used to match the jam theme better and for study porpouses only.

Font Minecrafter by PurePixel under creative commons.
